required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pulmonary Endarterectomy Guided by CT Scanning for Patients With Chronic Thromboembolic Pulmonary Hypertension----PEACT
clinical_study.official_title: The Precise Surgical Treatment of Chronic Thromboembolic Pulmonary Hypertension: Pulmonary Endarterectomy Guided by Three-dimensional Pulmonary Angiography
clinical_study.source: Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences, Fuwai Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a effectiveness study of the application of high-definition enhanced computed-tomography for patients with chronic thromboembolic pulmonary hypertension(CTEPH).The patients with CTEPH was randomized into 2 groups,precise pulmonary endarterectomy group(guided by enhanced CT scanning) and traditional pulmonary endarterectomy group,the hemodynamic changes tested with right sided heart catherization from baseline to post-operative period and end-point including peri-operative deaths,follow-up mortality,follow-up parameters of ultrasonic cardiogram(UCG),right-sided heart catherization(RHC),nuclear magnetic resonance imaging(MRI),cardiac pulmonary exercise test(CPET) are documented,so as to compare the prognosis between these 2 groups.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline pulmonary systolic pressure within 1 month
primary_outcome.time_frame: within 1 month before and after pulmonary endarterectomy surgery
primary_outcome.description: Systolic pulmonary pressure result tested by right-sided heart

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline pulmonary mean pressure within 1 month
primary_outcome.time_frame: within 1 month before and after pulmonary endarterectomy surgery
primary_outcome.description: Mean pulmonary pressure result tested by right-sided heart

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline pulmonary vascular resistance within 1 month
primary_outcome.time_frame: within 1 month before and after pulmonary endarterectomy surgery
primary_outcome.description: Pulmonary vascular resistance result tested by right-sided heart

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline cardiac output within 1 month
primary_outcome.time_frame: within 1 month before and after pulmonary endarterectomy surgery
primary_outcome.description: Cardiac output result tested by right-sided heart

primary_outcome.time_frame: immediately after the surgery to the longest 48 months follow-up period

secondary_outcome.measure: Follow-up tricuspid annular plane systolic excursion
Follow-up peak oxygen consumption (Peak O2) result

secondary_outcome.description: NYHA classes in the follow up period,either with telephone follow-up or out-patient follow up

arm_group.description: precise PEA therapy with the guide of 3-D imaging techniques
traditional PEA therapy solely by surgical probe and traditional CT scanning/pulmonary angiography method

intervention.description: For patients in Group 1,precisely analyzed CT scanning and/or pulmonary angiography will be done,and the patients in Group 1 will receive PEA procedure with the guide of precise 3-D imaging techniques

facility.name: Fuwai Hospital,Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences

link.description: a website could find all the citation above,enter the website of "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed",input the PubMed ID of corresponding citation,and the citation will be shown in the webpage.

reference.citation: Jamieson SW, Kapelanski DP, Sakakibara N, Manecke GR, Thistlethwaite PA, Kerr KM, Channick RN, Fedullo PF, Auger WR. Pulmonary endarterectomy: experience and lessons learned in 1,500 cases. Ann Thorac Surg. 2003 Nov;76(5):1457-62; discussion 1462-4.
